name: Hero Rabbit On The Bed
description:
What is a loop?

In my view,  the sick on the bed always experience a loop.  They have to fight with the disease and then lost the courage because it is difficult and painful.  And then the disease will go worse because of lack of hope.  We need to inspire their hope so that they are powerful enough to fight with the disease, otherwise they will be stuck in a loop - after the medical treatment they feel better then it goes worse because of lack of hope.

This game is about a hero rabbit who was poisoned by a slime. The doctor rabbit try to save the hero, but he found the poison spread again after the treatment. He was stuck in a loop. He need to find a way to break the loop. 

PC Controls:

Left Mouse Button  --  Click, click and click.
